challenges.name: 001: Sign Up
challenges.description: A sign up modal with form validation and animated feedback.

challenges.name: 002: Credit Card Checkout
challenges.description: A credit card checkout screen with form validation, credit card type detection (examples provided) and animated feedback.

challenges.name: 003: Landing Page
challenges.description: A landing page with rotating background images and a sign up input with email validation and animated feedback.

challenges.name: 004: Calculator
challenges.description: A simple, functional calculator using JavaScript's eval() function with basic error handling and equation logging that accepts both button and keyboard inputs.

challenges.name: 005: App Icon
challenges.description: A mobile app icon mockup for PeakBucket, a real life project.

challenges.name: 006: User Profile
challenges.description: What I think my dog's user profile would look like if dogs used social media. Responsive layout. Used Underscore.js and d3.js to generate random post content.

challenges.name: 007: Settings
challenges.description: Controls to style user supplied text using React.js and jQuery UI Slider.

challenges.name: 008: 404 Page
challenges.description: A launch-themed 404 page with typed animation.

challenges.name: 009: Music Player
challenges.description: A functional, responsive piano built with d3.js.

challenges.name: 010: Social Share
challenges.description: A set of functional, responsive social share buttons that resize to fit three screen sizes and share the current page.

challenges.name: 011: Flash Message
challenges.description: Success/Error message received after guessing a random number between 1 and 10.

challenges.name: 012: Ecommerce Shop
challenges.description: A responsive ecommerce shop for spinning widgets, including color selection, description and reviews.

challenges.name: 013: Direct Messaging
challenges.description: Direct message with a magic 8 ball. Built with React.js; responses driven by Underscore.js.

challenges.name: 014 Countdown Timer
challenges.description: A functional minutes and seconds countdown timer.

challenges.name: 015 On/Off Switch
challenges.description: A light switch with transitions driven by d3.js.
